snippet: For quite a while, Novak Djokovic's opponent in the U.S. Open semifinals, Gael Monfils, looked as if he didn't want to win — or even be there at all....
lead_paragraph: For quite a while, Novak Djokovic's opponent in the U.S. Open semifinals, Gael Monfils, looked as if he didn't want to win — or even be there at all.

headline.print_headline: After Odd Win, Djokovic to Face Wawrinka in US Open Final
headline.main: After Odd Win, Djokovic to Face Wawrinka in US Open Final
